SEARCH

Class borrowReturnTests

java.lang.Object
borrowReturnTests
public class borrowReturnTests extends Object
JUnit tests for book borrowing and returning operations in the Library system. Tests cover both successful operations and error conditions.

  • Method Details

    • setUp

      public void setUp()
      Initializes test environment before each test. Creates a library instance and adds test books: - Fiction book (code: 101, quantity: 5) - Reference book (code: 102, quantity: 1)

    • simulateAddBook

      private void simulateAddBook(String type, int code, String title, String author, int quantity)
      Simulates the book addition process through user input
      Parameters:
      type - Book type (f/r/n)
      code - Book code
      title - Book title
      author - Book author
      quantity - Initial stock quantity

    • testSuccessfulBorrow

      public void testSuccessfulBorrow()
      Tests successful borrowing of available fiction book Correct quantity deduction Returns true on success

    • testBorrowReferenceBook

      public void testBorrowReferenceBook()
      Tests borrowing attempt of reference book Rejects reference books Returns false for reference books

    • testSuccessfulReturn

      public void testSuccessfulReturn()
      Tests successful return of previously borrowed book Correct quantity restoration Returns true on success

    • testReturnExcessQuantity

      public void testReturnExcessQuantity()
      Tests returning more copies than borrowed Prevents over-returning Returns false on invalid return

    • testInvalidNumberInput

      public void testInvalidNumberInput()
      Tests handling of invalid numeric input Proper InputMismatchException handling InputMismatchException
